title: Stupid autofill fucked me hard,everyone need to learn to play support now.
body: At this moment another mate suck at support join the game

replies.body:
i mean, in previous seasons, there was no role selector and you had to know how to play EVERY role to some degree or accept dodge penalties.

Now you only need to know your first 2 roles and support (usually).
Exactly. Also, crying on OCE boards isn't going to help when you didn't get any sympathy on EUW boards :)
